summary.overview: The CardDemo Administrative Menu (CA00) provides a secure entry point for system administrators to access various administrative functions within the card management system. It handles user authentication, displays available administrative options, and routes users to appropriate administrative programs based on their selections.
business_functions: User Authentication Check - Validate user session and redirect to sign-on screen if no valid session exists
Display Initial Signon Screen - Show the signon screen to user when first accessing the application
Validate User Credentials - Check user ID and password entries for completeness and format
Authenticate User Credentials - Verify user exists in the system and password matches
Determine User Access Level - Check if authenticated user is an administrator or regular user
Route Administrator Users - Transfer control to admin menu for users with administrator privileges
Route Regular Users - Transfer control to main menu for users with regular privileges
Menu Screen Display - Display the admin menu screen with available options for administrators
Menu Option Validation - Validate user-entered option number against available admin menu options
Program Transfer Control - Transfer control to selected admin function program based on user choice
User Access Control - Enforce access restrictions and prevent unauthorized access to admin functions
Error Message Display - Display appropriate error messages for invalid inputs or authentication failures
Return to Sign-on - Handle user request to return to sign-on screen via function keys

CA00.program_overview: Administrative menu interface that displays admin options and routes to appropriate programs
User authentication and sign-on screen that validates credentials and routes users
Main menu interface for regular users with access control and program routing
